channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Getting started with AI agents (part 2): Autonomy, safeguards and pitfalls
item.description: Success in building AI agents hinges on mapping roles and workflows and establishing safeguards such as human oversight and error checks.
